hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Long time watcher, first time player. Greetings from Termina. Incentive goes to Randobot's choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Bottom of the Well Small Key# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Water Temple Small Key#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Zelda's Lullaby#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Water Temple Small Key#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Skull Mask#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Market Bazaar#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Time#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Time#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Near Scarecrow Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #20# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #the Keaton Mask#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #generic grotto#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that Sheik waits at a #monument to time# to teach #the Serenade of Water#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: Did you know that you can reach the invisible Hookshot target before the fans room in Shadow Temple with just the Hookshot if you backflip onto the chest?

ToT (Left).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #a Spirit Temple Compass# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #2# major items.
